entry.title: Pier Auge - Ekia Skin Lightening Treatment
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pier Augè
Type: All Skin Types
Price: 137.95

The Ekià facial treatment controls and erases pigmentation spots in the skin.  It contains one serum of 20ml and one treatment cream of 50ml.

Key Ingredients:

Serum - Grafted Protein, Vitamin C, Bear Berry, Nasturtium Flowers.

Cream - Cell Renewal Complex, Bear Berry, Aminopeptide Complex, Beech Buds.

Pier Auge is a brand exclusive to Breizh Esthetics, Beauty & Salon Supply Co. As a leader in anti-aging skin care we are proud to be partnered with such a prestigious brand in our area of specialty.

entry.title: Pier Auge - Ekia Skin Lightening Facial Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pier Augè
Type: All Skin Types
Price: 346.95

For all women seeking to prevent and reduce their pigmentation spots.  Actives of this anti-spot program go to slow down the production of Melanin.  The lightening Treatment restores skin radiance and brightness.

Key Ingredients: Cell Renewal Complex, Bear Berry, Aminopeptide Complex, Beech Buds, Hyaluronic Acid, Bio-mimetic Moisturizer, Evening Primrose Oil, Vitamin E

entry.title: Pier Auge - Slimming Body Wrap Mask with Laminaria Seaweeds
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pier Augè
Type: All Skin Types
Price: 167.95

This mask is applied as part of slimming treatment with essential oils and body wrap in the Silhouette Line.  It creates a synergy between the conditioning  effect of Luminaria, the lipolytic action of Guarana, the draining action of Horsetail, the toning action of Essential Oil of Rosemary, the moisturizing action of   seaweeds and stimulating action of Marine Diatoms.

Key Ingredients: Luminaria, Guarana Extract, Horsetail Extract, Rosemary Essential Oil, Marine Diatoms  ( Marine Sediments)

Pier Auge is a brand exclusive to Breizh Esthetics, Beauty & Salon Supply Co. As a leader in anti-aging skin care we are proud to be partnered with such a prestigious brand in our area of specialty.

entry.title: 1913 Pier Auge - Hydrating Fondamental Serum-Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pier Augè
Type: All Skin Types
Price: 75.95

Hydrating Serum-Gel contains the Protein called "Aquaporin" which received the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 2003 for its discovery.  By facilitating water distribution through cellular membranes, Aquaporins particularly AQp3 specific to skin, allow for preservation of water balance as well as skin metabolism.  It should be Ionised prior to the massge

Key Ingredient: Aquaporins

  Pier Auge is a brand exclusive to Breizh Esthetics, Beauty & Salon Supply Co. As a leader in anti-aging skin care we are proud to be partnered with such a prestigious brand in our area of specialty.
